name: falling kites (danielFH)
description:
there are 2 levels.

in the first one you escape obstacles in the sky while flying a kite.
In the second level you need to collect the falling kites and escape everything else that comes from the sky.

On a computer you can move with the arrow/WASD keys.
On a phone you can move with the buttons on the sides of the screen  and by pressing the screen
